alert.note: Alert for Adams (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 6:54AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN TENSAS... CONCORDIA...CATAHOULA PARISHES IN NORTHEASTERN LOUISIANA AND ADAMS COUNTIES THROUGH 800 AM CST... At 653 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Deville to near Bordelonville to near Lebeau. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Larto around 700 AM CST. Walters, New Era, Acme, and Mayna around 705 AM CST. Archie around 710 AM CST. Jonesville, Monterey, Black Hawk, and Slocum around 715 AM CST. Deer Park and Wildsville around 720 AM CST. Frogmore around 725 AM CST. Natchez, Ferriday, Ridgecrest, and Sibley around 730 AM CST. Vidalia and Clayton around 735 AM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
